pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Clay Block$(li)Ancient Debris$(li)Emerald Ore$(li)Emerald Block$(li)End Stone$(li)Deepslate$(li)Granite

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[360, 10, 110, 50, 0, 5]
This gem can be injected with a tier 2 injector setup.
